title: 'Pathetic product pathetic service from Amazon'
body: Firstly about the product,.......this sofa is not as per the colour displayed, and the colour combination is very bad , so please be careful while buying, .....the cushions used are not upto the mark.....their quite cheap.....it's definitely not worth the price . Secondly, the service from Amazon...... eventually as a customer when you return a product , the least you can expect is Amazon monitors the whole process and eases the procedure to the customer without much delay, but here it's completely opposite....these pickup(s) will eventually be handed over to 3rd party vendors such as 'Delhivery' , who are least bothered in any customers issue, they'd not care about how soon they'd pick up the product and hand it over to the concerned warehouse for fastening or expediting the process....the pick up agent assigned to my order was so rude that he marked that the door was locked ....and in return Amazon delayed the next pick up date to 5 days .....well these kind of discrepancies lowers the quality of Amazon , it's no more following ISO standards in providing feasible services to its customers.

title: 'Quick delivery. However the Product is not sturdy.'
body: PROS : Prompt installation. Great packing with safety. Almost 3 layers. Spotless. Colours as in picture.  CONS : However the sofa built is too weak. After Barely one month of use, the sofa has started to give away. (Have posted Pics. Note the droop on the right bottom.) It's started to droop from one side. Maybe the build material is very weak.  Since it's on one year warranty, have raised a warranty claim for a free replacement.  Please take a conscious decision when you buy it.  SEEMS IT'S A BAD CHOICE.

title: 'Need more cushions.'
body: 'The sofa felt hard. The cushions are not adequate. would have returned it if it was possible. It looks good but it not comfortable to sit on. The size of the seat cushion felt insufficient to me and I weigh 70kgs. The delivery was fast and assembly was quick.'
